import React from 'react' import {Card, CardBody, CardSubtitle, CardText, CardTitle, Table} from 'reactstrap' const Projects = () => { return(

My Projects

Restaurant App A web app where users can login/signup,View information about the restaurant,find available dishes and discounts,reserve tables and submit feedback to the restaurant.Various bootstrap classes such as grid system,Cards,Media objects,Accordion,MOdals,Carousel were used.
Technologies and Languages used: HTML,CSS,Javscript,Bootstrap. Playstore Analysis By using playstore dataset , visualized distribution of apps ,the categories and stats of the most installed apps,prediction of number of installs and reviews.
Technologies and Languages used: Python,pandas,numpy,matplotlib,sklearn Reactjs apps Todolist App - A task management app where a users can add and remove tasks.
BMI calculator – A user can calculate his/her BMI value and their category
Technologies and Languages used: :HTML,CSS,Javascript,Reactjs,Reactstrap

Workshops and Hackathon

Attended a workshop on “Demystifying Information Security” organized by the Department of Computer Science and Engineering,Kumaraguru College of Technology Attended a hackathon “Climathon” conducted by Kumaraguru College of Technology
) } export default Projects
